sqlMap.statement:
SELECT SQ.EZUPTIME AS EZUPTIME ,SQ.EZUPTIMEZONE AS EZUPTIMEZONE ,SQ.SPLY_QUOTE_NUM AS SPLY_QUOTE_NUM ,SQ.SPLY_QUOTE_NM AS SPLY_QUOTE_NM ,SQ.SPLY_QUOTE_CATG_CD AS SPLY_QUOTE_CATG_CD ,DOC.DS_ORD_CATG_DESC_TXT AS DS_ORD_CATG_DESC_TXT ,SQ.DS_ORD_TP_CD AS DS_ORD_TP_CD ,SQ.SPLY_QUOTE_SRC_TP_CD AS SPLY_QUOTE_SRC_TP_CD ,SQ.SPLY_QUOTE_DT AS SPLY_QUOTE_DT ,SQ.SPLY_QUOTE_VLD_DAYS_AOT AS SPLY_QUOTE_VLD_DAYS_AOT ,SQ.SPLY_QUOTE_VLD_THRU_DT AS SPLY_QUOTE_VLD_THRU_DT ,SQ.SPLY_QUOTE_STS_CD AS SPLY_QUOTE_STS_CD ,SQS.SPLY_QUOTE_STS_DESC_TXT AS SPLY_QUOTE_STS_DESC_TXT ,SQ.CUST_ISS_PO_NUM AS CUST_ISS_PO_NUM ,SQ.CUST_ISS_PO_DT AS CUST_ISS_PO_DT ,SQ.SLS_REP_TOC_CD AS SLS_REP_TOC_CD ,TOC.TOC_NM AS TOC_NM ,( SELECT SP.PSN_NUM FROM ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA ,S21_PSN SP WHERE OFA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND OFA.TOC_CD = TOC.TOC_CD AND OFA.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND OFA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND OFA.PSN_CD = SP.PSN_CD AND SP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS PSN_NUM ,CB.COA_BR_CD AS COA_BR_CD ,CB.COA_BR_DESC_TXT AS COA_BR_DESC_TXT ,CE.COA_EXTN_CD AS COA_EXTN_CD ,CE.COA_EXTN_DESC_TXT AS COA_EXTN_DESC_TXT ,(CASE WHEN CB.COA_BR_CD IS NOT NULL THEN CB.COA_BR_CD || ':' || CB.COA_BR_DESC_TXT END) AS COA_BR_ITEM ,(CASE WHEN CE.COA_EXTN_CD IS NOT NULL THEN CE.COA_EXTN_CD || ':' || CE.COA_EXTN_DESC_TXT END) AS COA_EXTN_ITEM ,SQ.PRC_CATG_CD AS PRC_CATG_CD ,PC.PRC_CATG_NM AS PRC_CATG_NM ,SQ.CPO_ORD_NUM AS CPO_ORD_NUM ,SQ.BILL_TO_CUST_ACCT_CD AS BILL_TO_CUST_ACCT_CD ,SQ.BILL_TO_CUST_CD AS BILL_TO_CUST_CD ,BDAC.DS_ACCT_NM AS BILL_TO_CUST_ACCT_NM ,(CASE WHEN BTC.FIRST_LINE_ADDR IS NOT NULL THEN DECODE (BTC.FIRST_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(BTC.FIRST_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (BTC.SCD_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(BTC.SCD_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (BTC.THIRD_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(BTC.THIRD_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (BTC.FRTH_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(BTC.FRTH_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || CONCAT (BTC.CTY_ADDR, ',') || RPAD (BTC.ST_CD, LENGTH (BTC.ST_CD) + 1) || BTC.POST_CD END) AS BILL_TO_ADDR ,SQ.SHIP_TO_CUST_ACCT_CD AS SHIP_TO_CUST_ACCT_CD ,SQ.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD AS SHIP_TO_CUST_CD ,SHDAC.DS_ACCT_NM AS SHIP_TO_CUST_ACCT_NM
,DECODE(SQ.DROP_SHIP_FLG, 'Y', SQ.SHIP_TO_LOC_NM, NULL, '') AS DS_SHIP_TO_LOC_NM
,(CASE WHEN SQ.DROP_SHIP_FLG = 'Y' THEN DECODE (SQ.SHIP_TO_ADDL_LOC_NM, NULL, '', CONCAT(SQ.SHIP_TO_ADDL_LOC_NM, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (SQ.SHIP_TO_FIRST_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(SQ.SHIP_TO_FIRST_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (SQ.SHIP_TO_SCD_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(SQ.SHIP_TO_SCD_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (SQ.SHIP_TO_THIRD_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(SQ.SHIP_TO_THIRD_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (SQ.SHIP_TO_FRTH_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(SQ.SHIP_TO_FRTH_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || CONCAT (SQ.SHIP_TO_CTY_ADDR, ',') || RPAD (SQ.SHIP_TO_ST_CD, LENGTH (SQ.SHIP_TO_ST_CD) + 1) || SQ.SHIP_TO_POST_CD ELSE DECODE (SQ.SHIP_TO_FIRST_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(SQ.SHIP_TO_FIRST_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (SQ.SHIP_TO_SCD_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(SQ.SHIP_TO_SCD_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (SQ.SHIP_TO_THIRD_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(SQ.SHIP_TO_THIRD_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (SQ.SHIP_TO_FRTH_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(SQ.SHIP_TO_FRTH_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || CONCAT (SQ.SHIP_TO_CTY_ADDR, ',') || RPAD (SQ.SHIP_TO_ST_CD, LENGTH (SQ.SHIP_TO_ST_CD) + 1) || SQ.SHIP_TO_POST_CD END) AS SHIP_TO_ADDR
,SQ.SHIP_TO_LOC_NM AS SHIP_TO_LOC_NM ,SQ.SHIP_TO_ADDL_LOC_NM AS SHIP_TO_ADDL_LOC_NM ,SQ.SHIP_TO_FIRST_LINE_ADDR AS SHIP_TO_FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,SQ.SHIP_TO_SCD_LINE_ADDR AS SHIP_TO_SCD_LINE_ADDR ,SQ.SHIP_TO_THIRD_LINE_ADDR AS SHIP_TO_THIRD_LINE_ADDR ,SQ.SHIP_TO_FRTH_LINE_ADDR AS SHIP_TO_FRTH_LINE_ADDR ,SQ.SHIP_TO_CTY_ADDR AS SHIP_TO_CTY_ADDR ,SQ.SHIP_TO_ST_CD AS SHIP_TO_ST_CD ,SQ.SHIP_TO_PROV_NM AS SHIP_TO_PROV_NM ,SQ.SHIP_TO_CNTY_NM AS SHIP_TO_CNTY_NM ,SQ.SHIP_TO_POST_CD AS SHIP_TO_POST_CD ,SQ.SHIP_TO_CTRY_CD AS SHIP_TO_CTRY_CD ,SQ.SHIP_TO_01_REF_CMNT_TXT AS SHIP_TO_01_REF_CMNT_TXT ,SQ.SHIP_TO_02_REF_CMNT_TXT AS SHIP_TO_02_REF_CMNT_TXT ,SQ.DROP_SHIP_FLG AS DROP_SHIP_FLG ,SQ.SELL_TO_CUST_CD AS SELL_TO_CUST_CD ,SQ.SOLD_TO_CUST_LOC_CD AS SOLD_TO_CUST_LOC_CD ,SEDAC.DS_ACCT_NM AS SOLD_TO_CUST_ACCT_NM ,(CASE WHEN SEBTC.FIRST_LINE_ADDR IS NOT NULL THEN DECODE (SEBTC.FIRST_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(SEBTC.FIRST_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (SEBTC.SCD_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(SEBTC.SCD_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (SEBTC.THIRD_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(SEBTC.THIRD_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || DECODE (SEBTC.FRTH_LINE_ADDR, NULL, '', CONCAT(SEBTC.FRTH_LINE_ADDR, CHR(13) || CHR(10))) || CONCAT (SEBTC.CTY_ADDR, ',') || RPAD (SEBTC.ST_CD, LENGTH (SEBTC.ST_CD) + 1) || SEBTC.POST_CD END) AS SOLD_TO_ADDR ,SQ.FRT_COND_CD AS FRT_COND_CD ,FC.FRT_COND_DESC_TXT AS FRT_COND_DESC_TXT ,SQ.CARR_SVC_LVL_CD AS CARR_SVC_LVL_CD ,CSL.CARR_SVC_LVL_DESC_TXT AS CARR_SVC_LVL_DESC_TXT ,SQ.SPCL_HDLG_TP_CD AS SPCL_HDLG_TP_CD ,SQ.SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD AS SHPG_SVC_LVL_CD ,SQ.CARR_ACCT_NUM AS CARR_ACCT_NUM ,SQ.RDD_DT AS RDD_DT ,SQ.PMT_TERM_CASH_DISC_CD AS PMT_TERM_CASH_DISC_CD ,PTCD.PMT_TERM_CASH_DISC_DESC_TXT AS PMT_TERM_CASH_DISC_DESC_TXT ,PTCD.PMT_CC_FLG AS PMT_CC_FLG ,SQ.DS_PMT_METH_CD AS DS_PMT_METH_CD ,SQ.DS_CR_CARD_PK AS DS_CR_CARD_PK
,SQ.QUOTE_PRINT_CMNT_TXT AS QUOTE_PRINT_CMNT_TXT ,SQ.ORD_PRINT_CMNT_TXT AS ORD_PRINT_CMNT_TXT ,(CASE WHEN SQ.SHPG_CMNT_PRINT_CD = '1' THEN 'Y' END) AS SHPG_CMNT_PRINT_CD
,SQ.SHPG_CMNT_TXT AS SHPG_CMNT_TXT ,SQ.SPLY_QUOTE_CMNT_TXT AS SPLY_QUOTE_CMNT_TXT ,SQ.INV_CMNT_TXT AS INV_CMNT_TXT ,(SVAP.USR_NM || DECODE (SVAP.USR_NM, NULL, '', '(') || SVAP.FIRST_NM || DECODE (SVAP.USR_NM, NULL, '', ' ') || SVAP.LAST_NM || DECODE (SVAP.USR_NM, NULL, '', ')')) AS SAVE_PSC_NM ,(SMAP.USR_NM || DECODE (SMAP.USR_NM, NULL, '', '(') || SMAP.FIRST_NM || DECODE (SMAP.USR_NM, NULL, '', ' ') || SMAP.LAST_NM || DECODE (SMAP.USR_NM, NULL, '', ')')) AS SUBMIT_PSC_NM ,SQ.SPLY_QUOTE_CRAT_TS AS SPLY_QUOTE_CRAT_TS ,SQ.SPLY_QUOTE_SUBMT_TS AS SPLY_QUOTE_SUBMT_TS ,SQ.FIRST_BLLG_ATTRB_NM AS FIRST_BLLG_ATTRB_NM ,SQ.FIRST_BLLG_ATTRB_VAL_TXT AS FIRST_BLLG_ATTRB_VAL_TXT ,SQ.SCD_BLLG_ATTRB_NM AS SCD_BLLG_ATTRB_NM ,SQ.SCD_BLLG_ATTRB_VAL_TXT AS SCD_BLLG_ATTRB_VAL_TXT ,SQ.THIRD_BLLG_ATTRB_NM AS THIRD_BLLG_ATTRB_NM ,SQ.THIRD_BLLG_ATTRB_VAL_TXT AS THIRD_BLLG_ATTRB_VAL_TXT ,SQ.FRTH_BLLG_ATTRB_NM AS FRTH_BLLG_ATTRB_NM ,SQ.FRTH_BLLG_ATTRB_VAL_TXT AS FRTH_BLLG_ATTRB_VAL_TXT ,SQ.FIFTH_BLLG_ATTRB_NM AS FIFTH_BLLG_ATTRB_NM ,SQ.FIFTH_BLLG_ATTRB_VAL_TXT AS FIFTH_BLLG_ATTRB_VAL_TXT ,SQ.SIXTH_BLLG_ATTRB_NM AS SIXTH_BLLG_ATTRB_NM ,SQ.SIXTH_BLLG_ATTRB_VAL_TXT AS SIXTH_BLLG_ATTRB_VAL_TXT ,SQ.PRC_CONTR_NUM AS PRC_CONTR_NUM ,DACLS.DS_ACCT_CLS_DESC_TXT AS DS_ACCT_CLS_DESC_TXT ,(CASE WHEN SEDAC.COA_CH_CD IS NOT NULL THEN SEDAC.COA_CH_CD || ':' || CC.COA_CH_DESC_TXT END) AS GL_ACCT_CLS ,SQ.CPO_SRC_TP_CD AS CPO_SRC_TP_CD ,SQ.CPO_ORD_TP_CD AS CPO_ORD_TP_CD ,SQ.FL_PRC_LIST_CD AS FL_PRC_LIST_CD ,DOTPD.LINE_BIZ_TP_CD AS LINE_BIZ_TP_CD ,DOTPD.DROP_SHIP_AVAL_FLG AS DROP_SHIP_AVAL_FLG ,SQ.SELL_TO_FIRST_REF_CMNT_TXT AS SELL_TO_FIRST_REF_CMNT_TXT
,SEBTC.LOC_NUM AS SELL_TO_LOC_NUM ,BTC.LOC_NUM AS BILL_TO_LOC_NUM ,SHTC.LOC_NUM AS SHIP_TO_LOC_NUM
FROM SPLY_QUOTE SQ ,DS_ORD_CATG DOC ,SPLY_QUOTE_STS SQS ,TOC TOC ,COA_BR CB ,COA_EXTN CE ,PRC_CATG PC ,SELL_TO_CUST BDAC ,BILL_TO_CUST BTC ,SELL_TO_CUST SHDAC ,SELL_TO_CUST SEDAC ,DS_ACCT_CLS DACLS ,COA_CH CC ,BILL_TO_CUST SEBTC ,FRT_COND FC ,CARR_SVC_LVL CSL ,PMT_TERM_CASH_DISC PTCD ,AUTH_PSN SVAP ,AUTH_PSN SMAP ,DS_ORD_TP_PROC_DFN DOTPD
,SHIP_TO_CUST SHTC
WHERE SQ.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SQ.SPLY_QUOTE_NUM = #splyQuoteNum# AND SQ.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND SQ.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQ.SPLY_QUOTE_CATG_CD = DOC.DS_ORD_CATG_CD (+) AND DOC.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQ.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SQS.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQ.SPLY_QUOTE_STS_CD = SQS.SPLY_QUOTE_STS_CD (+) AND SQS.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQ.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQ.SLS_REP_TOC_CD = TOC.TOC_CD (+) AND TOC.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND TOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CB.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND TOC.COA_BR_CD = CB.COA_BR_CD (+) AND CB.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND TOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CE.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND TOC.COA_EXTN_CD = CE.COA_EXTN_CD (+) AND CE.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQ.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PC.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQ.PRC_CATG_CD = PC.PRC_CATG_CD (+) AND PC.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQ.GLBL_CMPY_CD = BDAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQ.BILL_TO_CUST_ACCT_CD = BDAC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD (+) AND BDAC.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQ.GLBL_CMPY_CD = BTC.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQ.BILL_TO_CUST_CD = BTC.BILL_TO_CUST_CD (+) AND BTC.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQ.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SHDAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQ.SHIP_TO_CUST_ACCT_CD = SHDAC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD (+) AND SHDAC.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQ.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SEDAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQ.SELL_TO_CUST_CD = SEDAC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD (+) AND SEDAC.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SEDAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DACLS.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SEDAC.DS_ACCT_CLS_CD = DACLS.DS_ACCT_CLS_CD (+) AND DACLS.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SEDAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CC.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SEDAC.COA_CH_CD = CC.COA_CH_CD (+) AND CC.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQ.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SEBTC.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQ.SOLD_TO_CUST_LOC_CD = SEBTC.BILL_TO_CUST_CD (+) AND SEBTC.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQ.GLBL_CMPY_CD = FC.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQ.FRT_COND_CD = FC.FRT_COND_CD (+) AND FC.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQ.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CSL.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQ.CARR_SVC_LVL_CD = CSL.CARR_SVC_LVL_CD (+) AND CSL.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQ.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PTCD.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQ.PMT_TERM_CASH_DISC_CD = PTCD.PMT_TERM_CASH_DISC_CD (+) AND PTCD.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQ.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SVAP.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQ.ADMIN_PSN_CD = SVAP.USR_NM (+) AND SVAP.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQ.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SMAP.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQ.SPLY_QUOTE_SUBMT_PSN_CD = SMAP.USR_NM (+) AND SMAP.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQ.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DOTPD.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQ.DS_ORD_TP_CD = DOTPD.DS_ORD_TP_CD (+) AND DOTPD.ACTV_FLG (+) = 'Y' AND DOTPD.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQ.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SHTC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SQ.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD = SHTC.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD(+) AND SHTC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'

SELECT SQD.SPLY_QUOTE_DTL_LINE_NUM AS SPLY_QUOTE_DTL_LINE_NUM ,SQD.SPLY_QUOTE_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM AS SPLY_QUOTE_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM ,SQD.DPLY_QUOTE_LINE_NUM AS DPLY_QUOTE_LINE_NUM ,SQD.DPLY_QUOTE_LINE_SUB_NUM AS DPLY_QUOTE_LINE_SUB_NUM ,(CONCAT ('1', '.') || CONCAT (SQD.DPLY_QUOTE_LINE_NUM, DECODE (SQD.DPLY_QUOTE_LINE_SUB_NUM, NULL, '', '.')) || SQD.DPLY_QUOTE_LINE_SUB_NUM) AS DPLY_LINE_NUM ,SQD.MDSE_CD AS MDSE_CD ,SQD.MDSE_NM AS MDSE_NM ,SQD.ORD_CUST_UOM_QTY AS ORD_CUST_UOM_QTY ,SQD.CUST_UOM_CD AS CUST_UOM_CD ,SQD.DEAL_SPLY_QUOTE_DTL_SLS_AMT AS DEAL_SPLY_QUOTE_DTL_SLS_AMT ,SQD.DEAL_SPLY_QUOTE_DTL_NET_AMT AS DEAL_SPLY_QUOTE_DTL_NET_AMT ,SQD.DEAL_PRC_LIST_PRC_AMT AS DEAL_PRC_LIST_PRC_AMT ,SQD.PRC_CATG_CD AS PRC_CATG_CD ,PC.PRC_CATG_NM AS PRC_CATG_NM
,SQD.RDD_DT AS RDD_DT
,SQD.PRC_BASE_DT AS PRC_BASE_DT ,SQD.CUST_MDSE_CD AS CUST_MDSE_CD ,SQD.SUPD_LOCK_FLG AS SUPD_LOCK_FLG ,SQD.DS_ORD_LINE_CATG_CD AS DS_ORD_LINE_CATG_CD ,SQD.ORD_LINE_SRC_CD AS ORD_LINE_SRC_CD ,SQD.RTL_WH_CD AS RTL_WH_CD ,RW.RTL_WH_NM AS RTL_WH_NM ,SQD.RTL_SWH_CD AS RTL_SWH_CD ,RSW.RTL_SWH_NM AS RTL_SWH_NM ,SQD.ORD_QTY AS ORD_QTY ,SQD.SPLY_QUOTE_LINE_STS_CD AS SPLY_QUOTE_LINE_STS_CD ,SQS.SPLY_QUOTE_STS_DESC_TXT AS SPLY_QUOTE_STS_DESC_TXT ,SQD.SET_ITEM_SHIP_CPLT_FLG AS SET_ITEM_SHIP_CPLT_FLG ,SQD.ORIG_MDSE_CD AS ORIG_MDSE_CD ,SQD.MAN_PRC_FLG AS MAN_PRC_FLG ,MDSE.MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT AS MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT ,MDSE.MNF_ITEM_CD AS MNF_ITEM_CD ,DECODE (SQD.DPLY_QUOTE_LINE_SUB_NUM, NULL, 0, SQD.ORD_QTY / (SELECT NVL(SETSQD.ORD_QTY, 1) FROM SPLY_QUOTE_DTL SETSQD WHERE SQD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SETSQD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SQD.SPLY_QUOTE_NUM = SETSQD.SPLY_QUOTE_NUM AND SQD.SPLY_QUOTE_DTL_LINE_NUM = SETSQD.SPLY_QUOTE_DTL_LINE_NUM AND SETSQD.SPLY_QUOTE_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM = #prntSubLineNum# AND SETSQD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0') ) AS CHILD_MDSE_QTY
,( SELECT MSI.HAZ_MAT_FLG FROM MDSE_SFTY_INFO MSI WHERE MSI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MSI.MDSE_CD = MDSE.MDSE_CD AND MSI.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ) AS HAZ_MAT_FLG
FROM SPLY_QUOTE_DTL SQD ,PRC_CATG PC ,RTL_WH RW ,RTL_SWH RSW ,SPLY_QUOTE_STS SQS ,ORD_TAKE_MDSE OTM ,MDSE MDSE WHERE SQD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SQD.SPLY_QUOTE_NUM = #splyQuoteNum#
AND SQD.SPLY_QUOTE_LINE_STS_CD <> #splyQuoteLineStsCd#
AND SQD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND SQD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PC.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQD.PRC_CATG_CD = PC.PRC_CATG_CD (+) AND PC.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RW.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQD.RTL_WH_CD = RW.RTL_WH_CD (+) AND RW.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RSW.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQD.RTL_WH_CD = RSW.RTL_WH_CD (+) AND SQD.RTL_SWH_CD = RSW.RTL_SWH_CD (+) AND RSW.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SQS.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQD.SPLY_QUOTE_LINE_STS_CD = SQS.SPLY_QUOTE_STS_CD (+) AND SQS.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = OTM.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQD.MDSE_CD = OTM.ORD_TAKE_MDSE_CD (+) AND OTM.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = MDSE.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND NVL(OTM.MDSE_CD,SQD.MDSE_CD) = MDSE.MDSE_CD AND MDSE.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY SQD.SPLY_QUOTE_NUM ,SQD.DPLY_QUOTE_LINE_NUM ,SQD.DPLY_QUOTE_LINE_SUB_NUM NULLS FIRST

SELECT SQSC.SPLY_QUOTE_SLS_CR_PK AS SPLY_QUOTE_SLS_CR_PK ,SQSC.SLS_REP_TOC_CD AS SLS_REP_TOC_CD ,SQSC.SLS_REP_ROLE_TP_CD AS SLS_REP_ROLE_TP_CD ,SQSC.SLS_REP_CR_PCT AS SLS_REP_CR_PCT ,SQSC.SLS_CR_QUOT_FLG AS SLS_CR_QUOT_FLG FROM SPLY_QUOTE_SLS_CR SQSC WHERE SQSC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SQSC.SPLY_QUOTE_NUM = #splyQuoteNum# AND SQSC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY SQSC.SPLY_QUOTE_SLS_CR_PK

SELECT SQCP.SPLY_QUOTE_CTAC_PSN_PK AS SPLY_QUOTE_CTAC_PSN_PK ,SQCP.CTAC_PSN_PK AS CTAC_PSN_PK ,SQCP.CTAC_PSN_TP_CD AS CTAC_PSN_TP_CD ,SQCP.CTAC_PSN_FIRST_NM AS CTAC_PSN_FIRST_NM ,SQCP.CTAC_PSN_LAST_NM AS CTAC_PSN_LAST_NM ,SQCP.CTAC_PSN_TEL_NUM AS CTAC_PSN_TEL_NUM ,SQCP.CTAC_PSN_EXTN_NUM AS CTAC_PSN_EXTN_NUM ,SQCP.CTAC_PSN_EML_ADDR AS CTAC_PSN_EML_ADDR ,SQCP.CTAC_PSN_FAX_NUM AS CTAC_PSN_FAX_NUM ,SQCP.CTAC_CUST_REF_TP_CD AS CTAC_CUST_REF_TP_CD FROM SPLY_QUOTE_CTAC_PSN SQCP WHERE SQCP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SQCP.SPLY_QUOTE_NUM = #splyQuoteNum# AND SQCP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY SQCP.SPLY_QUOTE_CTAC_PSN_PK

SELECT SQD.SPLY_QUOTE_NUM AS SPLY_QUOTE_NUM ,SQD.DPLY_QUOTE_LINE_NUM AS DPLY_QUOTE_LINE_NUM ,SQD.DPLY_QUOTE_LINE_SUB_NUM AS DPLY_QUOTE_LINE_SUB_NUM ,(CONCAT ('1', '.') || CONCAT (SQD.DPLY_QUOTE_LINE_NUM, DECODE (SQD.DPLY_QUOTE_LINE_SUB_NUM, NULL, '', '.')) || SQD.DPLY_QUOTE_LINE_SUB_NUM) AS DPLY_LINE_NUM ,SQD.MDSE_CD AS MDSE_CD ,MDSE.MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT AS MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT ,SQD.UNIT_NET_WT AS UNIT_NET_WT ,SQD.ORD_QTY AS ORD_QTY
,CPJ.COA_PROJ_DESC_TXT AS COA_MDSE_TP_DESC_TXT
,SQS.SPLY_QUOTE_STS_DESC_TXT AS SPLY_QUOTE_STS_DESC_TXT ,CP.COA_PROD_DESC_TXT AS COA_PROD_DESC_TXT ,MDSE.ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_NM AS ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_NM ,MDSE.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_NM AS FIRST_PROD_CTRL_NM ,MDSE.SCD_PROD_CTRL_NM AS SCD_PROD_CTRL_NM ,MDSE.THIRD_PROD_CTRL_NM AS THIRD_PROD_CTRL_NM ,MDSE.FRTH_PROD_CTRL_NM AS FRTH_PROD_CTRL_NM FROM SPLY_QUOTE_DTL SQD ,ORD_TAKE_MDSE OTM ,MDSE MDSE ,COA_PROD CP
,COA_PROJ CPJ
,SPLY_QUOTE_STS SQS WHERE SQD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SQD.SPLY_QUOTE_NUM = #splyQuoteNum# AND SQD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND SQD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = OTM.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQD.MDSE_CD = OTM.ORD_TAKE_MDSE_CD (+) AND OTM.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = MDSE.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND NVL(OTM.MDSE_CD,SQD.MDSE_CD) = MDSE.MDSE_CD AND MDSE.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND MDSE.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CP.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND MDSE.COA_PROD_CD = CP.COA_PROD_CD (+) AND CP.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND MDSE.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CPJ.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND MDSE.COA_MDSE_TP_CD = CPJ.COA_PROJ_CD (+) AND CPJ.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0'
AND SQD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SQS.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND SQD.SPLY_QUOTE_LINE_STS_CD = SQS.SPLY_QUOTE_STS_CD (+) AND SQS.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0' ORDER BY SQD.SPLY_QUOTE_NUM ,SQD.DPLY_QUOTE_LINE_NUM ,SQD.DPLY_QUOTE_LINE_SUB_NUM NULLS FIRST

SELECT SQPCB.ORD_PRC_CALC_BASE_PK AS ORD_PRC_CALC_BASE_PK ,SQPCB.SPLY_QUOTE_DTL_LINE_NUM AS SPLY_QUOTE_DTL_LINE_NUM ,SQPCB.SPLY_QUOTE_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM AS SPLY_QUOTE_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM ,SQPCB.PRC_COND_TP_CD AS PRC_COND_TP_CD ,SQPCB.PRC_DTL_GRP_CD AS PRC_DTL_GRP_CD ,SQPCB.PRC_JRNL_GRP_CD AS PRC_JRNL_GRP_CD ,SQPCB.PKG_UOM_CD AS PKG_UOM_CD ,SQPCB.PRC_COND_UNIT_CD AS PRC_COND_UNIT_CD ,SQPCB.PRC_CALC_METH_CD AS PRC_CALC_METH_CD ,SQPCB.DS_MDSE_PRC_PK AS DS_MDSE_PRC_PK ,SQPCB.SPEC_COND_PRC_PK AS SPEC_COND_PRC_PK ,SQPCB.FRT_PER_WT_PK AS FRT_PER_WT_PK ,SQPCB.PRC_COND_MAN_ENTRY_FLG AS PRC_COND_MAN_ENTRY_FLG ,SQPCB.PRC_COND_MAN_ADD_FLG AS PRC_COND_MAN_ADD_FLG ,SQPCB.PRC_COND_MAN_DEL_FLG AS PRC_COND_MAN_DEL_FLG ,SQPCB.AUTO_PRC_AMT_RATE AS AUTO_PRC_AMT_RATE ,SQPCB.MAX_PRC_AMT_RATE AS MAX_PRC_AMT_RATE ,SQPCB.MIN_PRC_AMT_RATE AS MIN_PRC_AMT_RATE ,SQPCB.MAN_PRC_AMT_RATE AS MAN_PRC_AMT_RATE ,SQPCB.CALC_PRC_AMT_RATE AS CALC_PRC_AMT_RATE ,SQPCB.UNIT_PRC_AMT AS UNIT_PRC_AMT ,SQPCB.COA_ACCT_CD AS COA_ACCT_CD ,SQPCB.AUTO_PRC_CCY_CD AS AUTO_PRC_CCY_CD ,SQPCB.PRC_RULE_APPLY_FLG AS PRC_RULE_APPLY_FLG ,SQPCB.PRC_RULE_PRCD_PK AS PRC_RULE_PRCD_PK FROM SPLY_QUOTE_PRC_CALC_BASE SQPCB
,SPLY_QUOTE_DTL SQD
WHERE SQPCB.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SQPCB.SPLY_QUOTE_NUM = #splyQuoteNum# AND SQPCB.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND SQPCB.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SQD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SQPCB.SPLY_QUOTE_NUM = SQD.SPLY_QUOTE_NUM AND SQPCB.SPLY_QUOTE_DTL_LINE_NUM = SQD.SPLY_QUOTE_DTL_LINE_NUM AND SQPCB.SPLY_QUOTE_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM = SQD.SPLY_QUOTE_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM AND SQD.SPLY_QUOTE_LINE_STS_CD <> #splyQuoteLineStsCd# AND SQD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
ORDER BY SQPCB.SPLY_QUOTE_DTL_LINE_NUM ,SQPCB.SPLY_QUOTE_DTL_LINE_SUB_NUM ,SQPCB.ORD_PRC_CALC_BASE_PK

SELECT ROL.SPLY_QUOTE_RPT_OTPT_LOG_PK AS SPLY_QUOTE_RPT_OTPT_LOG_PK ,(CASE WHEN RT.SPLY_QUOTE_RPT_TP_DESC_TXT IS NOT NULL THEN RT.SPLY_QUOTE_RPT_TP_DESC_TXT || ' ' || ROL.SPLY_QUOTE_RPT_OTPT_TS END) AS SPLY_QUOTE_CONF_OUT_DESC_TXT FROM SPLY_QUOTE_RPT_OTPT_LOG ROL ,SPLY_QUOTE_RPT_TP RT WHERE ROL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ROL.SPLY_QUOTE_NUM = #splyQuoteNum# AND ROL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND ROL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RT.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND ROL.SPLY_QUOTE_RPT_TP_CD = RT.SPLY_QUOTE_RPT_TP_CD AND RT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY ROL.SPLY_QUOTE_RPT_OTPT_LOG_PK DESC

SELECT DCPR.CTAC_PSN_PK FROM DS_CTAC_PSN_RELN DCPR WHERE DCPR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DCPR.CTAC_PSN_PK = #ctacPsnPk# AND DCPR.CTAC_TP_CD = #ctacTpCd# AND DCPR.DS_ACCT_NUM IS NULL AND DCPR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND DCPR.LOC_NUM = ( SELECT BTC.LOC_NUM FROM BILL_TO_CUST BTC WHERE BTC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND BTC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND BTC.BILL_TO_CUST_CD = #billShipCd# )
AND DCPR.LOC_NUM = ( SELECT STC.LOC_NUM FROM SHIP_TO_CUST STC WHERE STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND STC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND STC.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD = #billShipCd# )
